title: Looking for friends to play and chill with, Rank doesn't matter!
body:
Just looking for people to play norms and maybe ranked with for fun. Rank doesn't matter. 
PS: I'm pretty laid back so don't be too toxic.

IGN: DramaticChicken

replies.body:
Hey I want to get into gold before season ends currently in s2 and came across your thread want to team up? I sent you a friends request already 
(ASH IS 1)
need to do the 5 person premade group no ranged you up for it ? worlds mission
